Name: Nuts & Berries
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.
Review: The inclusion of a carbonate (lemonade) may annoy some classical bartenders but it adds flavour, sweetness and dilution.
Nutrition: One serving of Nuts & Berries contains 180 calories
